mapper.insert: INSERT into t_comment (comm_idx, useridx, content, regDT) values(#{comm_idx}, #{useridx}, #{content}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT c.*, u.userid FROM t_comment c JOIN t_user u ON c.useridx = u.idx -- t_user 테이블과 조인하여 userid 가져오기 WHERE c.comm_idx = #{comm_idx} AND c.delState = 0 ORDER BY c.regDT DESC
